alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf and southwestern Franklin Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St George Island, moving north at 25 mph. A wind gust of 54 mph was recently measured on St George Island. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Buck Siding, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Beverly, Green Point, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Hays Place and Yent Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: A weather station on St George Island recently reported a wind gust to 54 mph. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
